name: Thomas W. Tomlin
feedback: An amazing product. Must to have product for Apple fans. Bluetooth connectivity is impressive, sound quality and noise cancellation fearures are great ! Moreover, look is tremendous. You can definitely make and take calls without any issues.

name: Helen M. Crain
feedback: In 12th day after buying, left airpod stopped working. It is like a dud. And unfortunately i cannot return it back as return window is closed now. Today i have submitted to apple service and hopefully i will get it on time. But it is really unfortunate how new product stopped working suddenly. Else product is just fine.

name: Karen M. Harris
feedback: Very good design and fit , suitable for Android phones with Bluetooth 4.0 . The music quality is good . Double tap sensors work pretty well . Answer and reject calls also work with a tap .

name: Brian J. Orsini
feedback: Good sound quality. Battery life is good. I was concerned as it is pricey to deliver it safely and in good condition. Amazon needs to deliver discounts for pricey products otherwise no point in purchasing online.

name: Brittney C. Potter
feedback: Love it! Fits seamlessly in my ears. Donâ€™t have to bother charging it. Sound is the best one can find. I have it on all the time and each time it connects with no difficultly. Goes perfectly with my 8 Plus.

name: Marvin S. Callis
feedback: I used to spend hours writing creative copy, but now all I do is tell Rytr what I need and it writes everything for me. It's the ultimate AI content writer, and a must-have tool for bloggers, marketers, & entrepreneurs.

name: Stephen A. Ellis
feedback: Sometimes I find it hard to get it connected to my iphone bluetooth. Receiver is not able to hear our voice while using it. But you can use it to listen songs and use it for even a calls, as it makes problem rarely.

name: Catherine D. Daugherty
feedback: Left earpiece was not working. Had to take it to the Apple Support Centre within a few hours of getting the item.

name: Joseph K. Maxwell
feedback: Kindly do not buy the product from this vendor. Got an defective piece where I need to go to the apple center to get it fixed

name: Scott R. Brown
feedback: A good product by apple | recommended| sound quality ,connectivity and features are stunning and good| overpriced but what to say its an apple feature of overpricing their hoods mainly in india and abroad too

name: Brittany G. Rogers
feedback: I use them for my Google Pixel 2 XL. They work flawlessly. Immediate connection via bluetooth. And the fit is perfect in the ears. I use them during my workouts. They are just 4 grams in weight. You can use them for hours without any discomfort. This has got to be my best buy for an audio device.

name: Teddy R. Dematteo
feedback: I used to spend hours writing creative copy, but now all I do is tell Rytr what I need and it writes everything for me. It's the ultimate AI content writer, and a must-have tool for bloggers, marketers, & entrepreneurs.
